description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=3/3. The nightmare is not over for Shelly. After being rescued by soldiers Shelly wakes up inside a structure surrounded by the sea. Faces a new threat, and discover how it all began.
description.short: The nightmare is not over for Shelly. After being rescued by soldiers Shelly wakes up inside a structure surrounded by the sea. Faces a new threat, and discover how it all began.
